article:
Jack is an English boy. He wants to have a friend in China. He has a healthy eating _ . He likes fruit _ vegetables. _ are his favourite vegetables . He often has fruit salad  _ dinner. He doesn't eat _ or ice cream. He doesn't want to be fat  .
Next to his home there _ a clothes shop. Today Jack wants to _ a new T-shirt. He goes to the clothes shop with _ mother. The T-shirts in all colours are 35 yuan each. Jack likes red very much, so he take a _ one.
